Opening of the History of OpenAI Present.description: An introduction to the presentation on the history of OpenAI, outlining the key topics to be covered including the founding, evolution, and future directions.

Introduction to OpenAI.layout: Bullet Points with Emphasized Text Highlights:text
Introduction to OpenAI.description: This slide covers the founding and mission of OpenAI, including its initial funding strategy and organizational structure.

Major Research Milestones.layout: Bullet Points with Emphasized Text Highlights:text
Major Research Milestones.description: An overview of OpenAI's major research milestones, featuring key achievements such as the development of the GPT series and advancements in robotics and AI safety.

Transition and Evolution.layout: Bullet Points with Emphasized Text Highlights:text
subsections: OpenAI LP and the Hybrid Model
Transition and Evolution.description: Discussion on OpenAI's transition to a capped-profit model under OpenAI LP, and its various partnerships and collaborations.

Ending of the History of OpenAI Presenta.description: A conclusion summarizing OpenAI's impact on AI research, its contribution to public policy, and its ongoing challenges and directions for the future.
